paper_title.en: Rapid Prototyping for a Future Aeronautical Mobile Communications System Using Software Defined Radio

publication_name.en: 2022 Integrated Communication, Navigation and Surveillance Conference (ICNS)

paper_title.en: Analysis of Transmission Delay Using Communication Protocol Simulator in VHF Datalink

description.en:
VHF radio system has been used for Air Traffic Control (ATC) communication, Aircraft Operational Communication (AOC) etc. on the continental area. The data communication system of the VHF radio system uses communication protocols specified in the international standards called SARPs (Standards and Recommended Practices) of the ICAO (International Civil Aviation Organization). The VHF data communication system is commonly called the VHF datalink system. The VHF datalink system has been implemented into AOC, however it has not yet been implemented into ATC communication in Japan. By using the VHF datalink system, an air traffic controller can exchange requests or instructions with a pilot on a flying aircraft, and it significantly contributes to the safety of flight.
CARATS, which is the abbreviation of "Collaborative Actions for Renovation of Air Traffic Systems", is a long-term vision for the future air traffic systems of the Japan Civil Aviation Bureau (JCAB) [1]. JCAB challenges to change the current air traffic systems into more intelligent systems.
We have been attending the activities of CARATS Working / Adhoc Group. We analyze the transmission delay as one of the performance analyses in the case of using the VHF datalink system for the part of the VHF ATC voice communication in the activities. For the analysis, we use the protocol simulator in which VHF communication protocol models are installed.
In this paper, we first describe the background of performance analysis and the VHF datalink system simulator for aeronautical communication. Then, we show the results of statistical analysis to be used as some parameters for the simulator. Finally, we describe the results of simulations and predict the communication performance in the future.

publication_name.en: 2014 INTEGRATED COMMUNICATIONS, NAVIGATION AND SURVEILLANCE CONFERENCE (ICNS)

paper_title.ja: 航空移動通信ディジタル狭帯域伝送路の評価
paper_title.en: Evaluation of Digital Narrowband Transmission Channel in Aeronautical Mobile Communications

description.ja: 航空移動通信のディジタル狭帯域伝送路評価を,VDLモード2/3システムの仕様をもとに計算機シミュレーション及び飛行実験によって行った.まずシミュレーションによってビット誤り率(BER)特性を求めた.更に,自由空間損失に基づくシステムマージンを求め,VDLモード2/3システムは地上局〜航空機局の見通し区間内で10dB以上のマージンを得る高い信頼性のシステムであることが分かった.飛行実験からは,受信レベル及びその分布等を算出するデータ処理区間は飛行距離500〜1000mが適すること,地上局からの距離とともにKファクタは増加し20dB程度にまで達することが示された.これらの結果から,ディジタル狭帯域伝送路はデータ処理区間内の受信レベルとKファクタ及び航空機の移動速度に関する正規化ドップラ周波数で評価できることが分かった.

publication_name.ja: 電子情報通信学会論文誌

paper_title.ja: Performance Evaluation of Multi Hop Relay Network for Oceanic Air Traffic Control Communication
paper_title.en: Performance Evaluation of Multi Hop Relay Network for Oceanic Air Traffic Control Communication

description.ja: This paper proposes a new kind of communication system for air traffic control over the oceans; it is particularly effective at handling high air traffic loads due to many oceanic flights. In this system, each aircraft position report is sent to its relevant ground station by forwardly relaying them via a multi hop ad-hoc network that is formed by the aircraft between this aircraft and the ground station. In addition, an effective multiple access scheme with optimal values is also proposed. This scheme enables the various aircraft involved in relaying the signal to operate autonomously in a flight-route airspace. Furthermore, two useful schemes are proposed for efficient timeslot reuse and timeslot assignment in cases of low aircraft densities: the position aided timeslot reuse (PATR) and distance based timeslot assignment (DBTA), respectively. Finally, another scheme is proposed to improve the achievable relayed packet rate under low aircraft densities, which is called interference-based node selection (IB-NS). In all, the proposed system combined with those three schemes show the availability to utilize this system for air traffic control communications, specifically on high traffic ocean routes.
description.en: This paper proposes a new kind of communication system for air traffic control over the oceans; it is particularly effective at handling high air traffic loads due to many oceanic flights. In this system, each aircraft position report is sent to its relevant ground station by forwardly relaying them via a multi hop ad-hoc network that is formed by the aircraft between this aircraft and the ground station. In addition, an effective multiple access scheme with optimal values is also proposed. This scheme enables the various aircraft involved in relaying the signal to operate autonomously in a flight-route airspace. Furthermore, two useful schemes are proposed for efficient timeslot reuse and timeslot assignment in cases of low aircraft densities: the position aided timeslot reuse (PATR) and distance based timeslot assignment (DBTA), respectively. Finally, another scheme is proposed to improve the achievable relayed packet rate under low aircraft densities, which is called interference-based node selection (IB-NS). In all, the proposed system combined with those three schemes show the availability to utilize this system for air traffic control communications, specifically on high traffic ocean routes.

paper_title.en: Oceanic air traffic control based on space - Time division multiple access

description.en: This paper has conducted a practical experiment to investigate the transmission characteristics between the two aircrafts on the air in aeronautical VHF frequency band. Based on that, a proper scheme combining the two typical features in any avionics application, space and time domains respectively. Space-Time Division Multiple Access (S-TDMA) scheme is incorporated were each sub frame is considered for each sub area. With high accuracy timing derived from other applications, all aircrafts in each sub area are operated autonomously from transmitting, broadcasting its own position information or relaying the neighbor's position information. In addition, against the unevenly distributed aircrafts, ADS-TSR (Autonomous Distance Based-Time Slot Reuse) scheme is proposed to enhance spectrum usage and system performance as well. The system shows the capability in enabling a new generation of widening the view for cockpit display not only for nearby area but also beyond the horizon and contribute to the feasibility of the future trend, a concept of free flight in aviation industry.

publication_name.en: AIAA/IEEE Digital Avionics Systems Conference - Proceedings

paper_title.ja: VHF帯航空通信におけるフェージング特性
paper_title.en: The Radio Fading Characteristics of VHF Aeronautical Communication

description.ja: 民間航空輸送の需要増に伴いVHF帯の航空通信量は増加の一途をたどっている. 通信量の増加に対応するために, 現在のVHF帯航空通信システムに代わるものとしてVDL(VHF Digital Link)の規格が制定された. VDLの導入によりVHF帯航空通信も本格的なディジタル通信の時代へと移行していくと考えられているが, ディジタル通信システムの設計に重要なVHF帯での詳しいフェージング特性が得られていない. 我々は航空機及びVDL通信システムを用いて電波伝搬に関する飛行実験を行った. 機上局側では機体反射によって定常波電力対不規則波電力比が約15dBの仲上・ライスフェージングが発生している等, VHF帯航空通信におけるフェージング特性を明らかにする.

paper_title.ja: 高度測定用レーダのための同一航空機判別法
paper_title.en: A Decision Rule of the Same Aircraft for Height Finding Radars

description.ja: 筆者らは,航空路の管制間隔短縮を支援するために,航空機の幾何学的高度を測る高度監視装置を提案してきた. この装置は,航空機の高度推定に用いる航跡データを2台のレーダで非同期に取得する.監視対象空域を複数機が飛行している場合,高度推定を行うには二つのレーダの間で航跡を対応付け,同一航空機のデータを抽出する必要がある. 本論文では航跡の対応付けの手法を提案する. この手法では,まず各レーダで得られた航跡データから特徴量(パラメータ)を抽出し,つぎにパラメータ値をもとに対応する航跡を判別する.判別基準はパラメータ値の差とパラメータ推定の標準偏差の定数倍を比較する方法を採用している.また,本手法の検証のため航跡疑似データを用いてコンピュータシミュレーションを行った.本論文では提案手法の有効性を確認し,また推定パラメータの分布に関する特徴を示す.

paper_title.ja: フェージング環境下におけるLDACS1ビット誤り率特性 (宇宙・航行エレクトロニクス)
paper_title.en: Bit error rate characteristics of LDACS1 under fading environment

description.ja: 将来の航空用データ通信システム候補にLDACS1(Lバンドディジタル航空通信システムタイプ1)がある.電子航法研究所で開発したLPES(LDACS物理層実験システム)は様々なチャネル環境下でのLDACS信号のビット誤り率を測定できる.今回LPESの改良を行うとともに,フェージング環境下でのLDACS信号ビヅト誤り率特性を評価した.フェージング環境はフェージングシミュレータによって模擬し,単純周波数シフト,巡航中,離発着時,空港内移動中の各状況を想定した.実験の結果,LDACSのリバースリンク(航空機局から地上基地局方向)ビット誤り率特性がフォワードリンク(地上基地局から航空機局方向)に比べてはるかに劣化することがわかった.
description.en: LDACS1 (L-band Digital Aeronautical Communication System, Type 1) is a candidate system for future aeronautical data link. LPES (LDACS Physical layer Experimental System), which has been developed by us, can measure BER (Bit Error Rate) characteristics of LDACS signals under various channel environments. In this paper, we improve the performances of LPES and evaluate BER characteristics of LDACS signals under fading channels. The fading channels are simulated with a fading simulator. Four environments such as simple frequency shift, flight in en-route, landing/taking-off in terminal area and moving in airport are provided for the simulator. After some experiments, we have found that the BER characteristics on reverse link are much worse than on forward link.

paper_title.ja: 航空用高速データリンクLDACSのBER特性 (宇宙・航行エレクトロニクス)
paper_title.en: BER characteristics of aeronautical high speed datalink LDACS

description.ja: 将来の航空用データ通信システムの候補にmACS(Lバンドディジタル航空通信システム)がある.LDACSはその規格が統一されておらず仕様が流動的である.また航空用Lバンドでは他の航空無線システムが運用されており,mACSと他システムとの電波干渉の影響も懸念される.近年ソフトウェア無線用ツールGNuRadioが普及してきたことから,GNURadioとUSRP(汎用ソフトウェア無線装置)を使い低コストなLDACS物理層実験システムを構築した.同システムを用いて,LDACSの規格・仕様に準じた送信信号を合成し,受信ビット誤り率特性を評価した.
description.en: LDACS (L-band Digital Aeronautical Communication System) is a candidate system for future aeronautical data link. The standards of LDACS have not been unified yet, therefore LDACS specifications are still not fixed. Since other radio systems are operated in aeronautical L-band, users should be concerned about the interferences between LDACS and other systems. We have built a low-cost LDACS physical layer experimental system. It consists of GNU Radio, which is a tool for software defined radio, PC and USRP (Universal Software Radio Peripheral). We have synthesized the signal adapted for LDACS specifications and have evaluated the performance of reception bit error rate.

paper_title.ja: 航空移動無線のディジタル伝送特性の評価
paper_title.en: Evaluation of Aeronautical wireless channel in Digital Transmission

description.ja: 航空移動無線のディジタル伝送特性について,コンピュータシミュレーションによるBER特性と飛行実測データによる仲上-ライスファクタK及びBERを基に評価した.まず,測定データから受信レベル及びBER等を算出する時のデータ処理区間は500〜1000[m]が適することを示す.その区間の受信レベル分布から推定されるKファクタは,地上局と機上局間の距離rに依存しr<30[km]ではK=7〜9[dB],r>50[km]になると20[dB]にも達する.そのため地上局から放射状方向に飛行した時のBER特性は複数のKファクタを持ち,Kは受信レベルが高い時は小さいが,E_b/N_0<15[dB]になるとBER劣化が急峻となり,K=20[dB]程度のBER特性に近づく.
description.en: Digital transmission in aeronautical wireless channel was evaluated with BER (Bit Error Rate) performance by computer simulation and flight experiment data through received signal level, Nakagami-Rice factor K and BER etc. First, data processing interval to treat measured data was decided to be 500[m] to 1000[m] from the viewpoints of received signal property and data processing. The K factor and BER in the interval were calculated by using measured data and were studied. The K factor depends on distance r between ground to aircraft stations, K=7〜9[dB] in r<30[km] and K reaches to 20[dB] farther than 200[km]. So when aircraft flies radially far away, the BER performance has a few K factors, which increases as decreasing E_b/N_0.

paper_title.en: A performance comparison between VDL mode 2 and VHF ACARS by protocol simulator

description.en: VHF Aircraft Communications Addressing and Reporting System (ACARS) is the most popular VHF aeronautical datalink. It is used for such applications as airline operation and air traffic control. VHF ACARS has only a 2400 bit/s (bps) transmission rate air-ground link. The VHF Digital Link mode 2 (VDL2) system, which has a thirteen times higher transmission rate air-ground link than VHF ACARS, is very similar to VHF ACARS. Both systems can deal with messages in ACARS format. Even though the systems are well used for various operations, their effective link capacities are not so clear. Finding out effective communication performance, including real link capacity and acceptable maximum delay, is useful for the design layout of ground facilities and rebuild datalink operation guidance in the near future. We built both VHF ACARS and VDL2 protocol models on an OPNET protocol simulator to evaluate their effective communication performance. This paper gives an outline of the protocol models and comparison results of these performances by simulation. Statistics such as transmission delay and throughput have been obtained under various load conditions for up to 200 aircraft. Before starting the simulation, we analyzed message data length and the message generation interval of VHF ACARS from real communication logs in Japan. The message data length was mostly distributed randomly, below 660 bytes, and messages exceeding 660 bytes rarely appeared. The message generation interval mostly followed Pareto distribution. We assumed that the message data length and data generation interval followed uniform distribution and Pareto distribution respectively. We found the following by analyzing simulation results. i) When data traffic load generated from an aircraft equaled the load directed to the aircraft, the VDL2 system was able to process 4.6 times more congested load than the VHF ACARS. ii) When data traffic load generated from an aircraft was five times higher than the load directed to the aircraft, the VDL2 system was able to process 8.8 times more congested load than the VHF ACARS. The load condition approximated real VHF ACARS data generation ratio between forward link and reverse link. ©2009 IEEE.

paper_title.ja: 日本におけるVHF帯航空移動通信トラヒックの解析
paper_title.en: Analysis of VHF Aeronautical Mobile Communications Traffic in Japan

description.ja: VHF帯航空移動通信のうち無線電話およびACARSの通信記録から,航空移動通信の通信トラヒックに関する解析を行い,通信トラヒックの時間変動および推移,通信サイト別トラヒック比率や通信時間分布の特性等を明らかにした.中でも通信時間や通信間隔の分布に関しては,イーサネットと同様に自己相似性やベキ分布の兆候が現れていることが分かった.本稿で明らかにした各種の特性は,通信トラヒックシミュレーションをはじめとして音声通信のデータ通信への置換による負荷分散効果の評価や通信システムの配置等の効率化に有用である.
description.en: We have analyzed the logs of VHF radio telephony and ACARS to investigate features of aeronautical mobile communications traffic. Some characteristics such as fluctuation of the traffic and distribution of transmission length are obtained. The distributions of transmission length and interval have similar shape to power law distribution and the property of self-similarity. The features shown in this article are useful for traffic simulation, evaluation of load sharing and improvement of site allocation.

paper_title.ja: 航空データ無線伝送路の特性 : VDL-Mode2/3 の評価
paper_title.en: BER Performance of VDL-Mode2/3 in Aeronautical wireless channel

description.ja: 次世代の航空通信システムとして研究されているVDL(VHF Digital Link)-Mode2/3の,ビット誤り率(BER)特性を検討した.この際,航空無線伝送路を4つの領域に分類し,各領域毎にパラメータを定めコンピュータシミュレーションし,その結果を基に,各領域における所要受信レベルを求めた.更に,VDLのシステム諸元を基に送受信間を自由空間として無線伝送路の評価を行った.その結果,BER特性は全領域においてVDLの伝送品質規格BER 10^<-3>を満たすが,航空機同士のair-air間通信ではドップラーシフトによるBER劣化の可能性が生じる.また,遠距離の見通し外通信になると,受信レベルが急降下しサービスエリア外となることがわかった.
description.en: Bit error rate (BER) performance of VDL-Mode2/3 expected as next generation's aeronautical communications system was investigated. Aeronautical wireless channel was classified into four area; Parking, Taxi, Arrival and En-Route, the parameter of each area was set, and the BER performance was simulated by computer so we got the required level at receiver input terminal in each area. Moreover, a wireless channel in transmission quality was evaluated based on the system parameter of VDL-Mode2/3 and the required level. It shows that the BER in each area is less than BER 10^<-3> required the transmission quality, therefore all area satisfy transmission specification for VDL-Mode2/3. When flying beyond line of sight, however, it becomes immediately outside coverage because of diffraction loss over a spherical earth, and it also sometimes happens to interrupt air-air channel due to large Doppler shift.

paper_title.ja: VDLモード3について
paper_title.en: VHF Digital Link Mode 3 System

publisher.ja: 公益社団法人 日本航海学会

publication_name.ja: 日本航海学会誌 NAVIGATION

paper_title.ja: 5GHz帯を用いた航空機用ディジタルデータ通信に関する研究
paper_title.en: A Study on 5GHz Digital Data Communication for Aircraft Traffic Control

description.ja: 航空交通業務の通信量の増加により,航空無線向けのVHF帯電波のチャネル割り当ては限界に近づいている.一方で,航空無線航行用に割り当てられている5GHz周波数帯は日本国内では現在本目的のために運用されていない.この5GHz帯を航空移動体通信に転用すれば今後の航空通信量の増加に対応でき,新しいデータ通信の方式を実現できると考えられる.データ通信を航空無線で実現する方法として,5GHz帯の周波数を使用した場合にどのような問題があるかを研究する必要がある.本橋では実験用航空機を使用した飛行実験を行い,5GHz帯の電波伝搬特性等の基礎データを取得し,その結果について考察した.
description.en: VHP spectrum used in aircraft wireless communication is expected to become saturated due to the enormous increase in aircraft traffic. However, 5GHz frequency band assigned for aircraft radio navigation still hasn't been utilized for that purpose in Japan. Increased aircraft communication traffic combined with increased demand on data transmission, has enhanced the need of employing 5GHz frequency band to aircraft communication. This paper aims to investigate the possible utilization of 5GHz frequency band to data transmission in aircraft communication. To do this, we carried out some flight tests by using an experimental aircraft. Transmission characteristics under 5GHz frequency band have been investigated, and we considered the characteristics in this paper.

research_project_title.ja: 高い角度分解能を持つ航空機監視用方向探知アンテナの開発
research_project_title.en: Development of direction-finding antennas for aircraft surveillance with high angular resolution

offer_organization.en: The Japan Society for the Promotion of Science

system_name.ja: 科学研究費助成事業 基盤研究(C)

institution_name.ja: 国立研究開発法人 海上・港湾・航空技術研究所 電子航法研究所
institution_name.en: Electronic Navigation Research Institute, National Institute of Maritime, Port and Aviation Technology, Japan

description.ja:
本研究では近距離航空機監視システム（LASS）受信局に適した高い角度分解能を持つ方向探知アンテナを開発する。方向探知では、(1) 角度分解能が高いこと、(2) 角度推定の等方性があること、(3) アンテナ素子数が少ないこと、(4) 同期・非同期信号にかかわらず最大3波まで分離できること、(5) 信号を実時間処理すること、を条件とした。これらを踏まえ、(1) どの方向でも角度分解能が概ね1～2度以内となること、(2) 最大3波の信号を分離できること、(3) 信号を実時間処理すること、を開発目標とする。
本年度は、アンテナ素子配置と信号処理手法について検証した。航空機からの応答信号がどの方向から到来するか事前にはわからない。このため、LASS受信局が1局の場合に少なくとも水平面内で等方性があるアンテナ素子配置と信号処理手法をモデル化し、計算機シミュレーションを行った。シミュレーション結果から、7素子からなる円形アレーアンテナが本研究の目的に適しているとの結論を得た。このアレーアンテナの形状は半径等のごくわずかな差を除けばエスパアンテナで多く使われている形状と同じであり、MUSICによる到来角推定アルゴリズムも同様に適用できることもわかった。なおエスパアンテナとは異なりアレーの各素子で個別にサンプリングを要する。
この結果を利用してアンテナ素子配置実験装置の設計も行った。同設計では、アレー各素子に対して1台の汎用ソフトウェア無線機器（USRP）を接続し全USRP間をクロック同期させて受信信号を記録することとした。

research_project_title.ja: 航空無線、データリンクに関する研究
research_project_title.en: Study on aeronautical communication and data link
